title: The Loans (Canada and USA and other Specified Countries) Act
title_en: The Loans (Canada and USA and other Specified Countries) Act
short_name: Loans (Canada and USA and other Specified Countries) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Loans (Canada and United
States of America and Other Specified Countries) (United Kingdom)
(Application) Order. 1963.

provisions.title: Section 2
